website_summaries.verdict: This stroller becomes a travel system because it works with infant seats and several toddler seating options.
pros: This stroller can handle two kids, including either two infant seats or several options for infants and toddlers at the same time
cons: This stroller does not come with the infant seat

customer_reviews.title: Overall it turned out to be a good stoller, once we lubricated the front wheel mounts.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller worked well at first, but became very difficult to steer, and almost impossible to turn in any way with one hand after a few weeks of usage. We thought it was defective at first and we would need to replace it, which was frustrating. Removing the front wheels and lubricating the posts and mating surfaces with some silicone grease fixed the problem and made a night and day difference to maneuverability. Hope that helps if any others have the same problem. Other than that it works great and the ability to switch back and forth from the car seat to the stroller, and the ability to change the direction baby faces are really nice features.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Amazon product defective???
customer_reviews.text: I hate this stroller. It's so difficult to push, steer and maneuver. My wrists hurt from trying to turn this thing and my palms hurt from having to hold it so tightly... Stroller bumps into everything bc it's so hard to steer. It's also a safety hazard should you ever need to quickly move away from danger, you can't. I wish I could return to amazon and get my money back but it's too late to return. Britax is sending me a replacement and I hope I don't have the same problems. I hope the amazon buy is just deffective and this new one moves like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: DGE

customer_reviews.title: We had a Britax single stroller and loved it, so naturally we bought this when we ...
customer_reviews.text: We had a Britax single stroller and loved it, so naturally we bought this when we had our baby girl. It was great for the first two weeks and all of a sudden the front wheels are very hard to steer. I've tried removing things from the stroller (child included), taking off the wheels and putting them back on, unlocking/locking the front wheels and it still is hard to push. I'm very disappointed because it was not a cheap stroller. I'm going to reach out to Britax and hopefully they have a solution, otherwise we are stuck with a hard to turn stroller. Other than the steering it is great, very convenient. However, steering is a major part of strollers.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H. Scott

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when it came out because I had read so many great reviews about the older model. I assumed this would be even better, I was so wrong. Like many other reviewers have stated, it quickly became very hard to steer. My son only weighs 14 pounds and even on the smoothest of surfaces it was impossible to steer. It also has a weird way of folding and it barely fit in my trunk. I ended up returning it and went with the city select instead and have been very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: it was great for maybe two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller about three months ago, it was great for maybe two weeks. After that however, the front left wheel became defective. As a result, the stroller is now nearly impossible to turn, rendering it useless. I cannot, in good conscience, recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Design. Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Stroller, best part is the ease of unfolding it and folding it. Quick, easy and painless. Was one of The only strollers where the front wheels would always be in contact with the ground as you unfolded it. Which means you don’t need to lift or pick it up at all to unfold it. You can simply pull the handle bar towards you and the front wheels automatically “shoot out” while the stroller is folded and sitting upright on the ground. Great design. Smooth rolling too. We were going to buy the uppa but just couldn’t justify the extra cost when this one was so amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Chernochan

customer_reviews.title: then after that it took great manpower getting it to turn
customer_reviews.text: it was a smooth ride for a week, then after that it took great manpower getting it to turn. Contacted Britax who responded promptly with new wheels and lubricant. Unfortunately, it didn't help much. Went and shelled out the big bucks for a uppababy cruz instead.
customer_reviews.author: Trina.Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Front wheels get stuck, impossible to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! So so heavy. Very difficult to maneuver even with nothing in the basket and just the stroller attachment and a 15 lbs baby! More and more often the front wheels get stuck and im not even able to move the stroller, especially indoors! So disappointed! Just get the three-wheeled Britax stroller instead. Will try to return.
customer_reviews.author: SallyQ

customer_reviews.title: Best Stroller I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: It’s not your average stroller it’s really heavy which is good I’ve had lighter strollers that didn’t hold up to well. I’ve had this stroller for a few month the front wheels do get hard to maneuver after the factory lubricant dries up but since I did my research before buying it I was prepared. Probably one of the smoothest riding strollers I’ve seen plus your baby is super comfortable in the seat. I took it do Disneyland it held a lot of stuff and it was easy to push all day long
customer_reviews.author: Araceli

customer_reviews.title: Wheels Stick.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would be one of the lucky ones and not have the issues a lot of people were reporting with the front wheels becoming very hard to steer. After about a month of consistent use, the front wheels are about impossible to turn. We have taken them apart and tried to clean and oil them, even though they were not visibly dirty and it seemed to make no difference. You have to put significant weight on the stroller to get them to turn the way you would like. Britax, you need a serious recall of this stroller. Many people have had this same issue. Don’t waste your money. Go for a Nuna or uppababy vista.
customer_reviews.author: Caley

customer_reviews.title: Do not get fool by the 7th picture doesnt not come with the baby basket
customer_reviews.text: We went to out friend's Baby Shower last saturday the new parents loves this baby cart. nice black and blue combination easy to assemble . only thing that other buyer's need to beware dont be fooled by the 7th picture it does not come with the baby basket. we thought its a combo baby cart and basket.
customer_reviews.author: H@rr1

customer_reviews.title: Hard to control
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed about this stroller. It's very hard to make a turn. I need to use both my hands to lead the stroller. It's so inconvenient and clumsy. I couldn't imagine that Britax produces such a poor quality thing. I wish I could return it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great features! Hoping the wheels hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love using this stroller so far! I bought knowing many have experienced problems with the front wheels and will update this review if I also experience issues. The extremely generous sized basket and the multiple seat positions were the main reasons I wanted this stroller and I am so happy with those two features! I do wish it folded smaller but it fits well in my mid sized suv trunk with additional room for groceries or other cargo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. Great for my toddler and 5 month old with car seat. At first it was confusing installing the car seat but I got the hang of it. Fits perfectly in our Honda civic 08
customer_reviews.author: YAS

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller.
customer_reviews.text: We use a britax car seat so I wanted to get one that was compatible. I also wanted a stroller that Had the seat facing me. This was the perfect one. Very comparable to the ups baby vista. It’s a little heavy and rickety. But other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Megan and Ryan Uretsky

customer_reviews.title: Imposible to push
customer_reviews.text: Same problem as everyone, IMPOSSIBLE to push it straight or make a turn. Waste of money, I’m SO disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The seat design is pretty good, therefore 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to turn or to keep rolling straight. Feels unsafe. Front wheels occasionally squeak. Quite cumbersome to fold and put into the car. The seat design is pretty good, therefore 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a garbage waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a junk for me. I ask the seller for a refund. He doesn't retreat. It's too heavy. It's too hard to push. My child is not comfortable. It's just uncomfortable. I hope you don't buy it. If you can, I want to give a star.
customer_reviews.author: jimmywong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as a double stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. I am so happy with the purchase! Perfect as a double stroller. I originally bought the Britax Double in hopes that it would fit the infant car seat on one side but it didn’t. I returned the double for the B-ready despite the price. I was even more happy that I received the green color at an even bigger discount just because of the color! And it’s beautiful. Easy to put together and fits the b-agile 35 infant car seat perfectly. Rides smoothly and goes over bumps well. I love Britax!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gawenda

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT purchase this stroller. It is horrible. It barely will turn and when you are strolling it veers to the left. I contacted customer service and they said I could not return it and said they would send replacement wheels...I put on the new replacement wheels and it did NOT improve at all. This was a complete waste of money because we cannot use it. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Clark

customer_reviews.title: It’s not working
customer_reviews.text: The wheels don't work, they can't be handled easily, it's a problem because they get stuck, I really expected something better
customer_reviews.author: America Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good stroller, however the front wheels can be difficult to maneuver and it is a little bulky. It is a good quality stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Cottle

customer_reviews.title: Hard to handle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as part of the whole travel system - she dumped it after a year because it was too difficult to load and maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: I love britax strollers
customer_reviews.text: I love britax strollers! I have a b agile for 3 years and it’s perfect. Only thing in the b ready is thay the lower seat doesn’t “turn” back. I waanted to put my newborn there, nu it is hard to lool at him with the seat upfront. But All the rest is perfect, stable, strong, and super nice design
customer_reviews.author: Ana C

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller it’s so Sturdy my daughter is over weight and she is a Size 6t and she’s only 2 and it’s Study enough for her we love Going on walks in it everything about this stroller is high quality so happy with my Purchase
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Reyes

customer_reviews.title: It is like pushing an old shopping cart with a crazy wheel.
customer_reviews.text: I have this stroller 2 stars because it did get the job done. But it did just that, pushing that thing felt like a job. I compare it to get an old shopping cart wth a crazy wheel. It was brutal. If I could go back and get a different one I would.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: If you want to avoid a ton of headache and backpains steer clear of this stroller. The wheels are impossible to move and get stuck on every single turn. Really disappointed especially when considering the costs versus other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, it’s sturdy, easy to use and the bottom basket is huge. I like all the settings for baby and the wheels handle anything, I’ve used it on smooth, bumpy and even sand surfaces, it glides right through anything. I can easily use my baby carrier with it as well. Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn KE

customer_reviews.title: Heavyweight hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this stroller, the frame is heavy duty, but is hard to maneuver the wheels gets stuck when trying to go different directions specially when the flood is smooth. Stroller is heavy and hard to get in the trunk specially when you are on the go.:(
customer_reviews.author: luzx

customer_reviews.title: Easy to push
customer_reviews.text: Easy to push, smooth ride. I have been using it with my infant Britax carseat whenever I take my newborn out. The only thing I don't like, which I didn't realize until I got it, was the footprint is big. The big footprint isn't ideal in small stores/restaurants, but I like to use it so I deal.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E.

customer_reviews.title: but still works much better than a new britax
customer_reviews.text: The main problem is wheels,the won’t turn or maneuver ,it’s very hard when you’re using stroller in the mall,target,etc,. I still keep my older Graco European model around the house,which I used with my older kid.It’s 7 years old and fair condition,but still works much better than a new britax...
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry Bobryshev

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. It is exactly what I wanted. Easy to assemble and sturdy. My sister recommended this stroller to me as she has 4 kids and the last 3 have used this with the additional seats that can be purchased. Can't wait to use it with my new baby.
customer_reviews.author: annawe

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch listing!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!the listing says it’s for. 2017 britax but I received a 2016 model
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Updated!!
customer_reviews.text: A good stroller but very hard to turn. The wheels don’t turn, they get stuck. I don’t know if I got a defective one but very disappointed. UPDATE I sprayed some WD-40 and worked like a charm! In love with stroller now!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kono

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stroller. Would give it 5 stars but Britax ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller . Would give it 5 stars but Britax stopped making adapters for infant carseats for this product! So basically i was stuck buying a britax carseat to use this for my newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal hope Chochrek

customer_reviews.title: Careful
customer_reviews.text: Stroller stopped turning right. Also I ordered a G2, but nowhere on my order slip, box, stroller does it list G2. I got bait and switched. Amazon needs to fix this problem. I sent for return.
customer_reviews.author: Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately this stroller is almost impossible to use as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this stroller is almost impossible to use as a double stroller. Not only is the stroller difficult to open, fold and store we have found that the locks on the front two wheels continuously lock (even when set in an unlocked position) while the stroller is in motion - every few seconds! This means that the wheels cannot be turned. We are continually having to reach down to manually unlock the wheels while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: lazarus89

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is horrible, while it looks sleek and is good quality, this is probably the worst stroller to push. The front left wheel always gets stuck and does not maneuver at all!! Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great stoller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! Paying $500 for it and I'm glad I love it! It's very practical and also very modern and chic looking! My little one is almost 2 months so I'm using it with the car seat so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stroller, confortable for the baby and parents. Great space and adaptable.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, so nice on uneven ground, however the front wheel snapped off while just pushing it up a ramp.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Noonan

customer_reviews.title: front wheel moving pretty smooth but the frame is little shaky
customer_reviews.text: I had britax b-abigail, compared to Abigail, it is little more heavier and take more space in my trunk(i have altima) it doesn't folding all the way. i had to separate seat and frame to put in my trunk. front wheel moving pretty smooth but the frame is little shaky. other than that, i'm happy with what i purchased. but only thing it just disappointed me, it said 2017 b ready( i bought poppy), it is made 2016/07/09, its 2016 b- ready. if you want to purchased 2017, it will not be the one.
customer_reviews.author: Soo

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, light and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Folds easily, and the coordinating infant carseats (anything by Britax) snap in and out with little to no effort. Very light as well. The seat that comes with it detaches easily, and this is also the model that will fit the child snack tray and stroller organizers/attachments (which is convenient). It fits neatly into the trunk of our compact car with extra room to spare, so it isn't a massive space-hog either. The material is high quality, and the storage compartments are durable and well-secured, so no worrying about things falling out. I'd definitely recommend this stroller for new moms.
customer_reviews.author: paperpetals

customer_reviews.title: When I first got the stroller it was easy to put together and navigate it but now it's ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the stroller it was easy to put together and navigate it but now it's so hard to maneuver. I always have to shuffle the stroller and pick it up to maneuver. I purchased this stroller back in November 2016! Not satisfied since I only had this for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this color!!! Pretty good..
customer_reviews.text: I 😍 love this stroller. Looks great and safety But,, Its a big!!!! So very very heavy 🤤 haha.
customer_reviews.author: sean hong

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not worth the price. Bad post-sale service.
customer_reviews.text: The fabric at the bottom began to crack for no reason and the screws of the wheels were badly screwed, which caused an annoying noise, and also scratched the wheels. Of course I made a warranty claim on the britax website giving all the details requested (model dates pictures etc etc...) more than 6 months ago and nobody answered.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Nunez

customer_reviews.title: can I replace a good one?
customer_reviews.text: The front wheel is frozen,just use two weeks, can I replace a good one?
customer_reviews.author: Mrs j

customer_reviews.title: So dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: I paid $500 and it came broken! 😠 I love everything about this stroller but when you pay this much money you don't want to open the box and have a piece fall out as you slide your brand new stroller out. If it breaks that easily it must not be quality. Guess I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: AJRina

product_meta.title: Britax B-Ready G2 Stroller, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackBritax's B Ready G2 is the ultimate stroller for families with ever changing needs. The modular design has an adjustable handlebar height and 12 seating options to adapt to your family’s needs with multiple seats, a bassinet or infant car seat (sold separately). Reversible top stroller seat lets your child ride facing you or looking out at the world. The canopy with ventilation window protects your child from the elements. The extra large storage basket is accessible for all sides and the quick fold design easily closes the stroller in seconds, even with two seats attached. Your child will love the ultra smooth ride thanks to the foam filled rubber tires and suspension system, and with a 4 position recline, they can comfortably relax. Automatic frame lock safely secures the closed stroller and keeps it compact for traveling or storing. This stroller allows you to be ready for anything. For use with children from birth when using infant car seat, bassinet, or second seat (sold separately) or with children at least 6 months old / up to 55 pounds when using top seat only. Stroller dimensions fully assembled in use 44" L x 24" W x 43.25" H. Seat width 11.5”.
feature_bullets: Versatile design, no flat rubber tires, and double seating with the same mobility as a single stroller
Quick fold with 1 or 2 seats attached; 12 seating options when paired with the B Ready Bassinet, Britax Infant Car Seats, or B Ready Second Seat (all sold separately)
Travel System ready: compatible with all Britax and BOB infant car seats
Extra large UV 50+ canopy, adjustable handlebar, 4 recline positions, and oversized storage basket
Fit: Birth to 55 pounds; maximum unfolded stroller dimensions 44 inch L x 24 inch W x 43.25 inch H
